title: Card Sounds - Audio Pack
longDescription:
Hi There!


This is the Card Sounds audio pack, i think even if your game is not a card game, maybe it has a mini game or something with cards, so thinking about that i've designed this pack, hope you like it!


Here's the list:


  1. Pick_Card_01
  2. Pick_Card_02
  3. Pick_Card_03
  4. Pick_Card_04
  5. Pick_Card_05
  6. Flip_Card_01
  7. Flip_Card_02
  8. Flip_Card_03
  9. Turn_Card_01
  10. Turn_Card_02
  11. Turn_Card_03
  12. Card_Attack_01
  13. Card_Attack_02
  14. Card_Attack_03
  15. Deck_Shuffle_01
  16. Deck_Shuffle_02
  17. Deck_Shuffle_03
  18. Deny_Card_01
  19. Deny_Card_02
  20. Deny_Card_03
  21. Destroy_Card_01
  22. Destroy_Card_02
  23. Destroy_Card_03
  24. Down_Card_01
  25. Electric_Card_01
  26. Fire_Card_01
  27. Ice_Card_01
  28. Open_Card_Package_01
  29. Resurrect_Card_01
  30. Resurrect_Card_02
  31. Resurrect_Card_03
  32. Summon_Card_01
  33. Summon_Card_02
  34. Summon_Card_03


Check the preview

Check the documentation


All files contain at least 2 variations that you're getting for free! :D
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 102

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100Hz

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) No

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) Yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Documentation: Check the documentation
